issue.title: How to Use plugins in SDF or convert SDF to URDF?

content.raw:
Sincerely thanks for your answer. Considering I only have my SDF model and
world now, I want to further ask one more question:

1. Actually what I want to do is to use gazebo_ros_control package and
gazebo plugins to control my robot (which are both SDF files ) in
simulation, but I find it difficult for me to figure out the relations of
steps in the whole process without reference to other existing simulating
project. I hope , if it is possible, could you please give me some
information about such kind of resource?

I would be very grateful.
Of course, I would ask for help on the page you provide next time. Sorry
for that.
content.html:
Sincerely thanks for your answer. Considering I only have my SDF model and world now, I want to further ask one more question:

  1. Actually what I want to do is to use gazebo_ros_control package and gazebo plugins to control my robot (which are both SDF files ) in simulation, but I find it difficult for me to figure out the relations of steps in the whole process without reference to other existing simulating project. I hope , if it is possible, could you please give me some information about such kind of resource?

I would be very grateful. Of course, I would ask for help on the page you provide next time. Sorry for that.
